welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Gornalwood, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom. Known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the beauty and culture of our wonderful city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Birmingham Airport is primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Birmingham Airport serves mainly international flights, including long-haul destinations.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
